attributes.action: Stop Birmingham City Council building Birmingham City a new stadium.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Birmingham city council yet again or certain councillors who have a conflict of interest are determined to build Birmingham City a 'free' stadium. This action alienates 75% of the population as it favours one club over another and cannot be construed as being in the public interest but only serving the interests of BCFC and certain councillors.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
